components.CourseGlimpse.cover.description: Placeholder text when the course we are glimpsing at is missing a cover image

components.CourseGlimpseList.courseCount.description: Result count & pagination information for course search. Appears right above search results
components.CourseGlimpseList.courseCount.message: A mostrar de {start, number} a {end, number} de {courseCount, number} {courseCount, plural, one {curso} other {cursos}} de acordo com a sua pesquisa

components.CourseRunEnrollment.enroll.description: CTA for users who can enroll in the course run or could enroll if they logged in.

components.CourseRunEnrollment.enrolled.description: Help text for users who see the "Go to course" CTA on course run enrollment
components.CourseRunEnrollment.enrolled.message: Está inscrito nesta edição do curso

components.CourseRunEnrollment.enrollmen.description: Help text replacing the CTA on a course run when enrollment is closed.
components.CourseRunEnrollment.enrollmen.message: A inscrição nesta edição do curso está fechada de momento

components.CourseRunEnrollment.enrollmen.description: Help text below the "Enroll now" CTA when an enrollment attempt has already failed.
components.CourseRunEnrollment.enrollmen.message: Ocorreu um erro ao processar a inscrição.

components.CourseRunEnrollment.goToCours.description: CTA for users who are already enrolled in a course run.

components.CourseRunEnrollment.loadingIn.description: Accessible text for the initial loading spinner on the course run enrollment button.
components.CourseRunEnrollment.loadingIn.message: A carregar a informação da inscrição...

components.CourseRunEnrollment.loginToEn.description: Helper text in the enroll button for non logged in users

components.DesktopUserMenu.menuPurpose.description: Accessible label for user menu button
components.DesktopUserMenu.menuPurpose.message: Acesso às suas configurações de perfil

components.LanguageSelector.currentlySel.description: Accessible hint to mark the currently selected language in the language selector

components.LanguageSelector.languages.description: Default text for the language selector button when the current language cannot be identified

components.LanguageSelector.selectLangua.description: Accessible label for the language selector button

components.LanguageSelector.switchToLang.description: Accessible link title for the language switching links in language selector

components.PaginateCourseSearch.currentl.description: Accessibility helper in pagination, shown next to the current page number when it is the last page.
Accessibility helper in pagination, shown next to the current page number when it is not the last page.

components.PaginateCourseSearch.lastPage.description: Accessibility helper for pagination, added on the last page link.

components.PaginateCourseSearch.nextPage.description: Accessibility helper for pagination, added on the next page link.

components.PaginateCourseSearch.pageN.description:
Accessibility helper for pagination, added on all page links for screen readers,
      only shown next to "page 1" visually.

components.PaginateCourseSearch.paginati.description: Label for the pagination navigation in course search results.

components.PaginateCourseSearch.previous.description: Accessibility helper for pagination, added on the previous page link.

components.RootSearchSuggestField.search.description: Placeholder text displayed in the search field when it is empty.

components.Search.errorMessage.description: Error message for Search view when the request to load courses fails
components.Search.errorMessage.message: Ocorreu um erro! Não foi possível carregar os cursos.

components.Search.hideFiltersPane.description: Accessibility text for the button/icon that toggles *off* the filters pane on mobile

components.Search.showFiltersPane.description: Accessibility text for the button/icon that toggles *on* the filters pane on mobile

components.Search.spinnerText.description: Accessibility text for the spinner while search results are being loaded
components.Search.spinnerText.message: A carregar os resultados da pesquisa...

components.Search.textQueryLengthWarning.description: Warning message in search results when the text query is not long enough to be used.
components.Search.textQueryLengthWarning.message: A pesquisa de texto requer pelo menos 3 caracteres. { query } não é longo o suficiente para pesquisar. Os resultados da pesquisa não serão alterados por esta consulta.

components.SearchFilterGroupModal.closeM.description: Text for the button to close the search filters modal

components.SearchFilterGroupModal.error.description: Error message when the search for more filter value fails in the search filters modal.
components.SearchFilterGroupModal.error.message: Ocorreu um erro ao pesquisar por {filterName}.

components.SearchFilterGroupModal.inputL.description: Accessible label for the search input in the search filter modal.

components.SearchFilterGroupModal.inputP.description: Placeholder message for the search input in the search filter modal.

components.SearchFilterGroupModal.modalT.description: Title for the modal to add more filter values in the search filters modal.

components.SearchFilterGroupModal.moreOp.description: Test for the button to see more filter values than the top N that appear by default.

components.SearchFilterGroupModal.queryT.description: Users need to enter at least 3 characters to search for more filter values; this message informs them when they start typing.
components.SearchFilterGroupModal.queryT.message: Digite pelo menos 3 caracteres para iniciar a pesquisa.

components.SearchFilterValueParent.ariaH.description: Accessibility message for the button to hide children of the current filter

components.SearchFilterValueParent.ariaS.description: Accessibility message for the button to show children of the current filter

components.SearchFiltersPane.clearFilter.description: Helper button in search filters pane in search page to remove all active filters
components.SearchFiltersPane.clearFilter.message: Limpar {activeFilterCount, number} {activeFilterCount, plural, one {filtro} other {filtros}} {activeFilterCount, plural, one {ativo} other {ativos}}

components.SearchFiltersPane.title.description: Title for the search filters pane in course search.

components.SearchInput.button.description: Accessibility text for the search button inside the Search input.

components.SearchSuggestField.searchFiel.description: Placeholder text displayed in the search field when it is empty.

components.UserLogin.spinnerText.description: Accessibility text for the spinner in the login area.
